M

main(String[]) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.ClientApp
Client entry point main class If the command line's arguments are null, the GUI client is created and started If the command line's argument is -cli, the CLI client is created and started Other cases generate errors that are printed in the standard output
main(String[]) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.ServerApp
Server entry point main class It creates a new server and runs it.

Class' constructor
move(PlayerMove) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method receives a move action At first it checks if the player who has sent the message is turn's player Then: - it checks if the selected worker can move, calling the canMove method - it checks if the selected cell is in the map returned by the checkCellAround function, meaning you can move there If every test is positive, it sets the next model's phase to BUILD, it updates the messages, and updates the turn It then updates the model using the new board and notifies the clients At the end, it checks if anyone won If an error is caught, it is sent to the client which generated it
move(PlayerMove) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GodCardController
It overrides the Controller's method, it adds a function to reset some internal data referred to certain gods if needed, then it calls another god card method to handle the move action and controls.
move(PlayerMove) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Model
This method is called by the controller to update data for a move event
